name: Cpanel Operations
author: JesoX

sections.description: Enables the WordPress admin or user to create an email account and/or ftp account on their cpanel from their WordPress site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the cpanel_ops folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Set its permission (roles).
  4. Enter the cpanel information in the Cpanel settings page under settings section.
  5. Go to widgets and drag and drop it to the sidebar widget
sections.faq:
Currently supported operations:

  1. Create new ftp account.
  2. Create new email account.

* The plugin provides a widget that when enabled provides access to the add ftp account page and the add email account page.

short_description: Create ftp accounts and email accounts from your wordpress site.
description: Enables the WordPress admin or user to create an email account and/or ftp account on their cpanel from their WordPress site.

screenshots.caption: screenshot-1.png shows the cpanel options page in the setting section in the administration panel after the plugin has been activated (don't forget the permission)
screenshot-2.png shows the cpanel options page.
screenshot-3.png shows the cpanel operations widget in the sidebar widget's area.
screenshot-4.png shows the Add ftp accounts form that the link offers.
screenshot-5.png shows the Add email accounts form the the link offers.
